@graph.title: Libraries - a design manual
@graph.abstract: The library in its social context / Liliane Wong with Nolan Lushington -- The library user as customer / Norma Blake -- On the typology of the library / Ursula Kleefisch-Jobst -- Form and function in library design / Karl-Heinz Schmitz -- Public libraries in the United States / Nolan Lushington -- Toward the design of libraries / Rebecca Chestnutt -- Plan configuration and layout / Liliane Wong -- Library spaces for children, teens and young adults / Liliane Wong -- Dialogues: client, librarian, architect / Klaus Ulrich Werner -- Funding options / Liliane Wong -- Structural concepts / Wolfgang Rudorf -- Climate control / Wolfgang Rudorf -- Lighting and illumination / Wolfgang Rudorf -- Daylighting / Mohamed Boubekri -- Refurbishment and building adaptation / Aat Vos -- Shelving / Wolfgang Rudorf, Liliane Wong -- Orientation and wayfinding systems / Michael Franke-Maier -- Book security and RFID / Frank Seeliger -- Selection of projects.
